name: Python for Beginners
details: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming, including variables, data types, and control structures. Perfect for beginners!

name: JavaScript Web Development
details: Master JavaScript and build interactive websites. Covers DOM manipulation, AJAX, and ES6 features.

name: Java Programming Masterclass
details: Become a Java expert with hands-on projects. Includes OOP, data structures, and advanced topics.

name: C# Game Development
details: Create games with C# and Unity. Learn game physics, AI, and multiplayer development.

name: React.js Fundamentals
details: Build dynamic web applications with React.js. Covers components, state management, and routing.

name: Data Science with Python
details: Analyze data and make predictions with Python. Includes Pandas, Matplotlib, and Scikit-Learn.

name: iOS App Development with Swift
details: Create iOS apps using Swift. Covers UI design, Core Data, and app deployment.

name: Full Stack Web Development
details: Become a full stack developer with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and MongoDB. Build real-world projects.

name: Machine Learning Fundamentals
details: Introduction to machine learning algorithms and models. Hands-on experience with Python and TensorFlow.
